notifications.title: Welcome to our platform
notifications.message: Thank you for signing up! We're excited to have you join our community. Here's some information to help you get started.

notifications.title: Verification code
notifications.message: Your verification code is 123456. It will expire in 10 minutes.

notifications.title: New feature available
notifications.message: We've just launched a new feature that we think you'll love. Check it out in your dashboard!

notifications.title: Your weekly summary
notifications.message: Here's a summary of your activity this week. You've made great progress!

notifications.title: Action required
notifications.message: Please update your profile information to ensure we can provide you with the best service.

notifications.title: Payment successful
notifications.message: Your payment of $49.99 has been successfully processed. Thank you for your purchase!
